statements: UPDATE user_profiles SET email='new_email@example.com', password='newpassword' WHERE user_id=1;

UPDATE Locks SET location='Main Entrance', is_locked=FALSE, date_installed='2022-01-15' WHERE lock_id = 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-4g7h-8i9j-0k1l2m3n4o5p';

UPDATE smart_locks SET is_locked = FALSE WHERE lock_id = 201;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com', username='new_username' WHERE user_id=1;
